excerpt: "Engineering giant Bosch is turning to Cambridge-based startup Fetch.ai for innovative “AIoT” trials. Fetch.ai is a blockchain (or distributed ledger, if you prefer) that is aiming to build a decentralised network of autonomous “agents” that perform real-world tasks."
